ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your abilities deal an additional 2% of the target's maximum Health as Magical Damage. If the target has over 2000 Health, your ability bonus damage scales up. This effect reaches a maximum of 7% Maximum Health damage at 2750 Health. Subsequent hits on the same target do half the bonus damage for the next 3s.

ShortDesc: Abilities deal bonus damage based on targets maximum health
